title: Troitskiy Most - Posadskaya
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Western, Russian
description: Part of chain restaurant. Serves salads, hot dishes, drinks and desserts. Menu is in Russian, but staff is ready to help. Directions: from Gobkovskaya metro station the cafe is on the other side of the prospekt and in the direction away from the river.
